Uses of Class
src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions  
    src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.schedulers

    • Uses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions

      Subclasses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ForeseeableAction
      ForeseeableAction describes an Action which progression is defined by a specified number of steps.
      class  FreeResourceAction<R extends Resource>
      FreeResourceAction describes an Action which attempts to free a Resource taken by a ResourcefulUser back to the specified pool.
      class  TakeResourceAction<R extends Resource>
      TakeResourceAction is an Action which attempts to take a Resource of the specified type from a pool used in the constructor and give to the ResourcefulUser specified in the constructor.

    • Uses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.schedulers

      Subclasses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.schedulers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FairScheduler
      FairScheduler handles multiple Actions and makes them progress simultaneously.
      class  Scheduler
      The Scheduler class describes a Scheduler which handles multiple actions at a time.
      class  SequentialScheduler
      SequentialScheduler handles multiple Action by finishing them one at time.
      Methods in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.schedulers with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Scheduler.addAction(Action action)
      Adds an action to the Scheduler, and resets the iterator to the first action.
      Constructors in src.swimmingpoolproblem.models.actions.schedulers with parameters of type Action 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor with an undefined number of parameters.

      Constructor with an undefined number of parameters.

    • Uses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.swimmingpool

      Subclasses of Action in src.swimmingpoolproblem.swimmingpool 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DressAction
      DressAction describes an action where a swimmer get dressed in a specified amount of steps.
      class  SwimAction
      SwimAction describes an action where a swimmer swims in a specified number of steps.
      class  Swimmer
      The Swimmer class describes a Swimmer at the swimming pool executing several actions in a sequential order.
      class  UndressAction
      DressAction describes an action where a swimmer get undressed in a specified amount of steps.
